description._content: To Make Your Own Color Photo from the Original Glass Plate Negative, use this file: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/prok.00911/ Prokudin-Gorskiĭ, Sergeĭ Mikhaĭlovich,, 1863-1944,, photographer. Ostrechiny. A Study. [Russian Empire] [1909] 1 negative (3 frames) : glass, b&w, three-color separation ; 24 x 9 cm. Notes: With a high degree of probability, the picture shows S. M. Prokudin-Gorskii's sons Dmitrii (left) and Mikhail (right) on the Svir River. (Source: Legacy of S. M. Prokudin-Gorsky, 2013) Forms part of: Sergei Mikhailovich Prokudin-Gorskii Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Boats. Waterways. Russia (Federation)--Ostrechiny. Russia (Federation)--Volga-Baltic Waterway. Format: Glass negatives. Color separation negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. For additional information on commercial use, see "Prokudin-Gorskii...," lcweb.loc.gov/rr/print/res/237_prok.html Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/prokc.20911 Call Number: LC-P87- 5035
